scripts.dev:both: npx concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/flower-api && npm install && cd ../flower-client && npm install && cd ../../packages/shared-types && npm install
scripts.db:dev:reset: docker-compose -f db/docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f db/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.dev:full: npm run db:dev:up && npm run dev:both
